tool_descriptions.set_address: Configures the user's address for checking outage schedules. Address is saved and used for all subsequent requests. Important: city and street must have correct prefixes (–º., –ü—Ä–æ—Å–ø., –í—É–ª., etc.) as they appear in DTEK autocomplete. Can be run this way: 'Set address –º. –î–Ω—ñ–ø—Ä–æ, –≤—É–ª. . –í º—è—á–µ—Å–ª–∞–≤–∞ –õ–∏–ø–∏–Ω—Å—å–∫–æ–≥–æ, –±—É–¥. 4'.
tool_descriptions.check_outage_schedule: Checks electricity outage schedule for configured address. Always fetches both accurate schedule for today/tomorrow (ACTUAL) and weekly forecast (POSSIBLE_WEEK) from DTEK website. Parameter include_possible controls whether to show forecast in output. Make sure address is configured via set_address first. Can be run this way: 'Check electricity outage schedule for today (with time when we have electricity too)'.
tool_descriptions.get_next_outage: Finds the next upcoming electricity outage from accurate schedule (ACTUAL). Shows when and for how long the outage is scheduled. Works only with accurate schedule for today/tomorrow.
tool_descriptions.get_outages_for_day: Gets all outages for specific day of week. Can retrieve both accurate schedule (ACTUAL) for today/tomorrow and forecast (POSSIBLE_WEEK).
tool_descriptions.configure_monitoring: Configures monitoring and notification settings. Automatically sets up background monitoring (cron job/LaunchAgent) when enabled. Set how many minutes before outage to notify, enable/disable notifications, and configure check interval. Everything is automatic - no manual setup required!
tool_descriptions.check_upcoming_outages: Checks for upcoming outages based on configured notification settings. Returns notification if outage is approaching within configured time window. Use this to get proactive alerts about upcoming power cuts.

tool_params.include_possible: Show weekly forecast in output (data is always fetched and cached)
tool_params.force_refresh: Force refresh data from website (ignore cache)
tool_params.schedule_type: Schedule type: 'actual' - accurate schedule (today/tomorrow), 'possible_week' - weekly forecast
tool_params.notification_before_minutes: How many minutes before outage to send notification (default: 60)
tool_params.enabled: Enable or disable monitoring notifications (default: false)
tool_params.check_interval_minutes: How often to check for updates in minutes (default: 60)
